Package com.boole.jgmp.math.shapes

Class JGMPRect

java.lang.Object
com.boole.jgmp.math.shapes.JGMPRect
public class JGMPRect extends Object
2D Rectangle Shape Model for the JGMP Library.
Includes many optimized tools for Quadrilateral Mathematics.

  • Constructor Details

    • JGMPRect

      public JGMPRect(float x, float y, float ex, float ey)
      Initialize the JGMPRect given the coodinates of the top left and bottom right corner coordinates
      Parameters:
      x - x-coordinate of the top left vertex of the JGMPRect
      y - y-coordinate of the top left vertex of the JGMPRect
      ex - x-coordinate of the bottom right vertex of the JGMPRect
      ey - y-coordinate of the bottom right vertex of the JGMPRect

    • JGMPRect

      public JGMPRect(JGMPVector2 topLeft, JGMPVector2 bottomRight)
      Initialize the JGMPRect given the coodinates of the top left and bottom right vertices
      Parameters:
      topLeft - top left vertex of the JGMPRect
      bottomRight - bottom right vertex of the JGMPRect

    • JGMPRect

      public JGMPRect(float x, float y, int w, int h)
      Initialize the JGMPRect given the top left vertex and the width and height of the JGMPRect
      Parameters:
      x - x-coordinate of the top left vertex of the JGMPRect
      y - y-coordinate of the top left vertex of the JGMPRect
      w - width of the JGMPRect
      h - height of the JGMPRect
